item.title: CVE-2021-24393|2024-08-03T19:28:23.800Z -- unknown -- comment%20highlighter
item.description: A c GET parameter of the Comment Highlighter WordPress plugin through 0.13 is not properly sanitised, escaped or validated before inserting to a SQL statement, leading to SQL injection.
